message.content:
cs.DC, cs.IT, cs.NI, cs.SY, cs.CR 

Reasoning: 
1. cs.DC (Distributed, Parallel, and Cluster Computing) - The paper deals with distributed storage systems and proposes an algorithm for managing requests from users. 
2. cs.IT (Information Theory) - The paper discusses the use of regenerating codes for reducing replication and optimizing bandwidth usage. 
3. cs.NI (Networking and Internet Architecture) - The paper uses network coding for processing the parts of the file and storing them at various nodes. 
4. cs.SY (Systems and Control) - The paper proposes a mechanism for ensuring reliability in case of node failure and maintaining availability. 
5. cs.CR (Cryptography and Security) - The paper may touch upon security concerns related to distributed storage systems and propose measures to prevent unauthorized access.
